release_notes.en-US: Xpunge 2.1.1 fixes a bug in the options page that prevented individual folders from being set up to be compacted. Please note that in this version, the options (preferences) page of Xpunge is available through the "Tools --> Add-on Options --> Xpunge" Menu Bar entry. Translations included: Danish (da), French (fr-FR), German (de), Greek (el), Japanese (ja) and Russian (ru). Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html

release_notes.en-US: Xpunge 2.1.0 is an attempt to quickly get Xpunge running in Thunderbird 78. Support for legacy extensions like Xpunge was removed in Thunderbird 78, which means that Xpunge has to be re-written as a MailExtension. While I am working on this re-write, I have made version 2.1.0 available so users can continue to work with Xpunge. Due to limitations imposed by MailExtensions, Xpunge can only add one button in Thunderbird. So one of the two buttons provided by Xpunge in previous versions (called "Xpunge") is not available in version 2.1.0. You can invoke the functionality that used to be offered by that button through a menu entry: Tools --> Xpunge --> Xpunge --> Call Xpunge Now. The "MultiXpunge" button is still available. Please note that in this version, the options (preferences) page of Xpunge is available through the "Tools --> Add-on Options --> Xpunge" menu entry. Translations included: Danish (da), French (fr-FR), German (de), Greek (el), Japanese (ja) and Russian (ru). Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html

release_notes.en-US: This release contains changes to make Xpunge compatible with Thunderbird 60. Version 0.7 of Xpunge is compatible with Thunderbird 60 and above. For older versions of Thunderbird, please download an older version of Xpunge. The option to open the preferences page of Xpunge in a dialog has been removed from the "Xpunge" sub-menu under the "Tools" menu. This is because the preferences page now opens in a tab and Thunderbird also adds it's own sub-menu (called "Add-on references") under the "Tool" menu, which contains a menu item to access Xpunge's preferences page. Translations included: Danish (da), French (fr-FR), German (de), Greek (el), Japanese (ja) and Russian (ru). Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html

release_notes.en-US: This is a release compatible with Thunderbird 3. The functionality of version 0.4 is otherwise the same as that of 0.3. Translations included: Dutch (nl-NL), French (fr-FR), Greek (el-GR), Hebrew (he-IL), Hungarian (hu-HU), Russian (ru-RU) and Spanish-Spain (es-ES). Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html

This is the first major release in a while and introduces a few new features: the timer can now also be set at a specific time every day, a confirmation dialog can be displayed when Xpunge or MultiXpunge is called, there are buttons in the Preferences window to add/remove all accounts from the list of accounts to be processed, Xpunge and MultiXpunge can now be called from the menu too. Translations included: French (fr-FR), Greek (el-GR), Hebrew (he-IL), Hungarian (hu-HU), Russian (ru-RU) and Spanish-Spain (es-ES). Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html
This is just a minor release, to make the extension compatible with TB 2. The functionality of 0.2.3 is exactly the same as that of 0.2.2.

The homepage for Xpunge has changed so this release includes the correct address. Lots of things are in the ToDo list but not enough time to implement anything for this release. Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html Supported locales: English (en-US), Chinese-Traditional (zh-TW), Croatian (hr-HR), Danish (da-DK), French (fr-FR), Greek (el-GR), Italian (it-IT), Japanese (ja), Polish (pl-PL), Russian (ru-RU), Slovak (sk-SK), Spanish-Spain (es-ES) and Ukrainian (uk-UA). Please read the "Developer Comments" on the main page before installing this extension.

This release introduces small improvements, such as not showing Newsgroup accounts in the trash folder lists and a new icon for the "MultiXpunge" button that is easier to distinguish. Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.cs.ualberta.ca/~tegos/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html Supported locales: English (en-US), Chinese-Traditional (zh-TW), Croatian (hr-HR), Danish (da-DK), French (fr-FR), Greek (el-GR), Italian (it-IT), Japanese (ja), Polish (pl-PL), Russian (ru-RU), Slovak (sk-SK), Spanish-Spain (es-ES) and Ukrainian (uk-UA). Please read the "Developer Comments" on the main page before installing this extension.

This release introduces two new major features. A timer has been added that automates the functionality of the extension and there is now the capability to select individual folders (in addition to whole accounts) for compacting with the "MultiXpunge" button. Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.cs.ualberta.ca/~tegos/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html Supported locales: English (en-US), Chinese-Traditional (zh-TW), Croatian (hr-HR), Danish (da-DK), French (fr-FR), Greek (el-GR), Italian (it-IT), Japanese (ja), Polish (pl-PL), Russian (ru-RU), Slovak (sk-SK), Spanish-Spain (es-ES) and Ukrainian (uk-UA). Please read the "Developer Comments" on the main page before installing this extension.

This is a bug fix release. Two harmless (i.e. no data loss) bugs have been discovered and corrected, and more locales have been added. Please take a look at the release notes for more information: http://www.cs.ualberta.ca/~tegos/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/index.html Supported locales: English (en-US), French (fr-FR), Greek (el-GR), Italian (it-IT), Japanese (ja), Polish (pl-PL), Portuguese-Brazilian (pt-BR), Slovak (sk-SK), Spanish-Spain (es-ES) and Turkish (tr-TR). Please read the "Developer Comments" on the main page before installing this extension. I have also made available a beta version of Xpunge that includes a timer feature for automating the functionality provided by the extension. Take a look at the corresponding entry in the comments section and please visit: http://www.cs.ualberta.ca/~tegos/mozilla/tb/releases/xpunge/timer/index.html if you would like to test the new feature and provide your feedback.

There are no major changes in this release. The new additions are button tooltips (for the toolbar buttons) and some locales.

Supported locales: en-US (English), fr-FR (French) and el-GR (Greek).

Please read the "Developer Comments" on the main page before installing this extension.

This version introduces a second toolbar button that offers the functionality to process multiple email accounts with just one click. It also makes the two functions ("Empty Trash" and "Compact Folders") optional, both for a single account and for multiple email accounts.

Please read the "Developer Comments" on this page before installing this extension.

Updated compatibility with Thunderbird 1.5b2. 

A revamped release with customizable features and the functionality to process multiple email accounts with one click is coming soon. Follow the "MultiXpunge" link in the Developer Comments for a preview.
This is the initial release.
